sentence.Network_en: He drew on his experience as a yachtsman to make a documentary programme.
sentence.Network_cn: 他凭借曾经做过快艇驾驶员的经验制作了一档纪实节目。

sentence.Network_en: A yachtsman got into trouble off the coast and had to be rescued.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个驾驶帆船的人在海上遇险需要救援.

entry.tran: 驾驶游艇（或快艇）的人;帆船比赛选手
entry.def: A yachtsman is a man who sails a yacht.
